column4: groups info is kept in the file /etc/group. Ideally you'd want to restore this file from a recent backup (you *do* have a recent backup, right?). Failing that, you can copy the file from another system, but then you'll have lost any custom changes you had on your system....
So, anyone know how to restor all groups ? I tried to restor group file from /var/backup/ but, not all are there :S
it's not my system, it's theres... And I don't think they have some custom changes :)
if there are no custom changes, a copy of /etc/group from a system running the same OS version will probably do the trick, then...
